name: Citation & Link Tracking Generator
description: Generates citation tracking system with link extraction and citation graph capabilities
why: To build a citation graph that tracks outbound links and relationships between resources
outputPrompt:
Generate the Citation & Link Tracking system:

1. **Model (backend/app/models/citation.py)**:
   - Citation: id, source_resource_id, target_url, target_resource_id (nullable), citation_type (reference/dataset/code), context_snippet
   - Add relationships to Resource model

2. **Service (backend/app/services/citation_service.py)**:
   - extract_citations(resource_id) — parse HTML/PDF for links, extract context
   - resolve_internal_citations() — match target URLs to existing resources
   - get_citation_graph(resource_id) — inbound and outbound citations
   - compute_citation_importance() — PageRank-style scoring

3. **Endpoints (backend/app/api/citations.py)**:
   - GET /resources/{id}/citations — list citations with resolved targets
   - GET /graph/citations — system-wide citation overview

Follow existing project patterns for database models, service architecture, and API structure.
